content: dive into the world of sanrio with our tiny pompompurin amigurumi with his signature beret and lovable expression this adorable little dog is the perfect addition to any amigurumi collection even if you re new to crochet you ll find this pattern easy to follow allowing you to craft your own pompompurin quickly get ready to bring a piece of kawaii magic into your home **materials** - milk cotton yarn 2 5mm - crochet hook 2 75 3mm - fiberfill sewing needle scissors **permitted use** you can sell items made from these patterns/tutorial videos a small quantity of fewer than 50 products/month provided that they are handmade by yourself and you give credit to the designer please add the following lines to your item description and any item you are selling ** pattern by amivui studio ** https //amivuistudio com/ i would love to see your ﬁnished doll so please share the picture with me tag me @amivuistudio and use the hashtags #amivuistudio and #amivui on instagram let us know if you have a specific question or give an idea of what you re looking for we re happy to make recommendations **check out our other products** https //shop amiguworld com/ 1 **contact** contact us via email amivuistudio@gmail com ⁠ᵔ⁠ᴥ⁠ᵔ⁠ 1 https //shop amiguworld com/
